tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:name: The annual US-GAAP Taxonomy
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:description: The 2018 U.S. Financial Reporting Taxonomy (Taxonomy) contains updates for accounting standards and other improvements since the 2016 Taxonomy as used by issuers filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: All components including Taxonomy Disclosure Templates and five related SEC Taxonomies - DEI, INVEST, COUNTRY, STPR, CURRENCY, EXCH
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes ALL components for the US GAAP Financial Reporting Taxonomy plus Taxonomy Disclosure Templates. Five related SEC Taxonomies are also imported - DEI, INVEST, COUNTRY, CURRENCY, and EXCH.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: All components including Taxonomy Disclosure Templates except for doc, -chg-, and ref linkbases. Includes four related SEC Taxonomies - DEI, INVEST, COUNTRY, CURRENCY.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes all components for the US GAAP Financial Reporting Taxonomy plus Taxonomy Disclosure Templates except for document, change, and reference linkbases. Four related SEC Taxonomies are also imported - DEI, INVEST, COUNTRY, and CURRENCY.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: All components except for Taxonomy Disclosure Templates. Includes six related SEC Taxonomies - DEI, INVEST, COUNTRY, STPR, CURRENCY, EXCH.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes ALL components for the US GAAP Financial Reporting Taxonomy except Taxonomy Disclosure Templates. Six related SEC Taxonomies are also imported - DEI, INVEST, COUNTRY, STPR, CURRENCY, and EXCH.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: All Taxonomy Disclosure Templates and related components including three related SEC Taxonomies - DEI, INVEST, and COUNTRY.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes Taxonomy Disclosure Templates and related components for the US GAAP Financial Reporting Taxonomy. Three related SEC Taxonomies are also imported - DEI, INVEST, and COUNTRY.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Elements, Labels, Documentation, References, Deprecated presentations, Deprecated mapping, Change notes, Implementation notes, Implementation note relatioships)
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes the elements for the US GAAP Financial Reporting Taxonomy with their standard, period start, period end, total, axis default, and documentation labels. It also include references. It does not include presentation, calculation, or definition linkbases. Five related SEC Taxonomies are imported - DEI, INVEST, COUNTRY, CURRENCY, EXCH. This entry point also includes the following non industry/statement and non disclosure presentation and definition linkbases: 999000 - Deprecated - Deprecated Concepts (presentation) 999000 - Deprecated - Deprecated Concepts (definition). This entry pint also includes Change notes, Implementation notes, and Implementation note relationships

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Elements, Labels, Documentation, References, Deprecated presentations, Deprecated mapping, SEC DEI, INVEST, COUNTRY, CURRENCY, EXCH Imports
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes the elements for the US GAAP Financial Reporting Taxonomy with their standard, period start, period end, total, axis default, and documentation labels. It also include references. It does not include presentation, calculation, or definition linkbases. Five related SEC Taxonomies are imported - DEI, INVEST, COUNTRY, CURRENCY, EXCH. This entry point also includes the following non industry/statement and non disclosure presentation and definition linkbases: 999000 - Deprecated - Deprecated Concepts (presentation) 999000 - Deprecated - Deprecated Concepts (definition)

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Elements, Labels, Documentation, References, SEC DEI, INVEST, COUNTRY, CURRENCY, EXCH Imports
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes the elements for the US GAAP Financial Reporting Taxonomy with their standard, period start, period end, total, axis default, and documentation labels. It also include references. It does not include presentation, calculation, or definition linkbases. Five related SEC Taxonomies are imported - DEI, INVEST, COUNTRY, CURRENCY, EXCH.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Elements, Labels, Deprecated presentations, Deprecated mapping, SEC DEI and INVEST Imports
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes the elements for the US GAAP Financial Reporting Taxonomy with their standard, period start, period end, total and axis default labels. It does not include presentation, calculation, definition, or reference linkbases. Two related SEC Taxonomies are imported - DEI and INVEST. This entry point also includes the following non industry/statement and non disclosure presentation and definition linkbases: 999000 - Deprecated - Deprecated Concepts (presentation) 999000 - Deprecated - Deprecated Concepts (definition)

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Elements, Labels, SEC DEI and INVEST Imports
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes the elements for the US GAAP Financial Reporting Taxonomy with their standard, period start, period end, total and axis default labels. It does not include presentation, calculation, definition, or reference linkbases. Two related SEC Taxonomies are imported - DEI and INVEST.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Elements only
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the schema file (elements) for the US GAAP Financial Reporting Taxonomy. This entry point contains only elements and does not contain any linkbases.
